body:
My Computer basically started smoking so...Prolly getting a new one xP. 

Are you a Apple, or a Windows? 

And if So how old is your computer :D?
Comment below 

Also! Feel free to ask me questions. I'll be more than happy to answer them (Make sure they're appropriate). 

I'm bored ^~^
